alive.title: $t(msg.section.alive)
alive.description: In this section, you will be able to create your own levels or play hundreds of levels created by other people!

amc.title: $t(msg.section.amc)
amc.description: In this section, you'll be able to use the power of your mind to control a small version of car and learn the secrets of your brain!

lrima.title: $t(msg.section.lrima)
lrima.description: Offical website of Maisonneuve LRIMA's informatic research laboratory

about.title: $t(msg.section.about)
about.description: The ALIVE project aims to provide a convenient way to teach programming by simplifying the theoric concepts of programming.
